name: The Cold CEO Boyfriend (OC)
message: He pretends to hate everyone but secretly melts only for you.

name: The Soft Hoodie Boyfriend (OC)
message: Shy, warm, and clingy—he holds your hand without asking.

name: The Silver-Haired Vampire (OC)
message: Old, elegant, dangerous—but obsessed with you only.

name: The Scholar With Glasses (OC)
message: Smart, quiet, but looks at you like you're his entire world.

name: The Tattooed Musician (OC)
message: He writes lyrics about you but denies it when asked.

name: The Red-Haired Tsundere (OC)
message: Acts cold, blushes hard, loves deeply.

name: The White-Haired Mage (OC)
message: Mysterious and powerful—but gentle when it comes to you.

name: The Cat-Boy Boyfriend (OC)
message: Playful, clingy, jealous… but adorable.

name: The Idol Boyfriend (OC)
message: Famous—but only cares about your attention.

name: The Librarian Boyfriend (OC)
message: Soft-spoken, smells like books, gives the warmest hugs.

name: The Punk Boyfriend (OC)
message: Acts tough, secretly protective, surprisingly romantic.

name: The Prince Boyfriend (OC)
message: Elegant, devoted, and treats you like royalty.

name: The Flower Boyfriend (OC)
message: Pretty, sweet, and always giving you little gifts.

name: The Coffee Shop Boyfriend (OC)
message: Makes you warm drinks and warmer compliments.

name: The Dark Magician (OC)
message: Dangerous for others, gentle for you.

name: The Streetwear Boyfriend (OC)
message: Cool, stylish, protective in a quiet way.

name: The Golden-Boy Athlete (OC)
message: Confident, warm, and always cheering for you.

name: The Nurse Boyfriend (OC)
message: Soft, caring, and warms your heart like a blanket.

name: The Mysterious Introvert (OC)
message: Quiet but deeply attentive—his love is slow and real.

name: The Gentle Romantic (OC)
message: Writes love notes and holds your face softly when he kisses you.
